landing.title: CRYPTO-WORLD FOOTBAL CHAMPIONSHIP 2018
landing.section1Text: Fans of the most ranked teams in the world compete for the Crypto-World Soccer Championship. You rank up your favorite club by scoring crypto-goals.
landing.section2Text: The Crypto Champions of the year will win Augmented Reality trophies. Fans will be able to place the AR trophy on surfaces using a mobile app (ARKit/ARCore).
landing.section2Text2: Seven Trophies will be produced yearly, for each Top Club of World, Europe, Asia, South America, North/Central America, Oceania and Africa
landing.section3Text: You will receive back 2 BOLEIRO (BLR) tokens for each goal scored(when you score above 1 goal at once). Boleiros can be used in Dapp upcoming modules, AR Collectibles and predictions.
landing.section3Text2: BOLEIRO(BLR) is an ERC-20 Token, and a maximum of 45 millions will be generated.
landing.section4Text: Do you really know football ? Earn Ether by predicting the right results of competitions/matches
landing.section5Title: MOST RANKED SOCCER CLUBS OF THE WORLD
landing.section5Text: About 200 of the most ranked teams from all continents compete for the top position of the Crypto-World. Every Year, 30 least voted teams will be replaced by new ranked clubs
landing.infoText: This DApp uses MetaMask. Click the logo to install it if necessary
landing.infoText3: BLOCK-CHAMPS comes from the idea of joining our passion of Soccer, Crypto and AR
landing.donations: We are a creative team from Brazil, passionate about Blockchain, A.R. and football. We are using a 'build-first' approach to our projects (zero-funded), so if you like our ideas and wish to helps us developing new cool features, we are happily accepting donations at this stage :)
